name: Dialing
description: Dialing is match-3 reinvented with a hint of never-ending difficult. The numbers are always increasing and so is the challenge.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 60 MB available space
